meanings.definition: A small, lightweight car with a motorcycle engine.
meanings.sent1: My uncle restored a vintage cyclecar from the 1920s.
meanings.sent2: The cyclecar zipped through the narrow streets effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The cyclecar and the big truck had a race, and the little car won!
meanings.sent4: Her cyclecar was a roaring lion among the city traffic.
meanings.sent5: The bright red cyclecar gleamed under the sun, attracting everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To drive or ride in a cyclecar.
meanings.sent1: I love to cyclecar around the countryside on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She cyclecars to work every day, enjoying the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: He cyclecars so fast that even the birds can't keep up!
meanings.sent4: In his dreams, he cyclecars through space and time.
meanings.sent5: The children cyclecar happily in the park, laughing and having fun.
